text.intro:
When you subscribe to a subreddit, you're subscribing to the people that post to it. Where else do they post?

Click on a subreddit to see where else its authors are writing. Colors show subreddit bubbles, where the same people are posting in different subreddits about different topics. With a subreddit selected, click on 'See Nested Communities' to see the bubbles inside the bubbles!

Check out 'Inter-community Influence Network' in 'Explore Networks' below to see how some of the largest bubbles overlap - which political bubbles overlap the most with the rest of Reddit?

About this Analysis
text.title: What's Your Bubble?

legend.edgeLabel: Similar Users (sized by average % of front page authored by shared users)
legend.colorLabel: Community (a subreddit's userbase is more similar to other subreddits within its community than without)
legend.nodeLabel: Subreddit (sized by number of connected subreddits)
